bill_title: prohibit certain regulated entities from providing financial support for events involving the Public Utilities Commission.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to prohibit certain regulated entities from providing financial support for events involving the Public Utilities Commission. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 49-1 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: No company or other entity over which the Public Utilities Commission has supervision may provide financial or in-kind support for any informational, social, educational, or promotional event that is sponsored by the Public Utilities Commission or at which the Public Utilities Commission provides more than fifty percent of presentation time, presenters, or printed or electronic informational materials. 180 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.052 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
